startGame() - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.view.ViewListener
The implementation of this method (in the CreationState) controls that all the necessary preparing has been done due to initiating the Game.
startGame(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ControllerState
Method that permit to start the game through its different implementation controls that all the necessary preparing has been done due to initiating the Game.
startGame(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.CreationState
Method that starts the Game by initializing the board through a JsonBoardPattern, then adds the necessary tiles to the board itself.
startGame(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.FinishingState
Method that starts the Game Does nothing in this implementation since game is in finishing state.
startGame(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.InPauseState
The method starts verifying if the Game creation has occurred properly, confronting the number of active players registered during the previous phase with that stored in the Model.
startGame(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.OnGoingState
Method that starts the Game Does nothing in this implementation since game is in on_going state.

This class represents the command that enables the Game's startup.
